description: Number of oriented triangle graphs with transitively oriented maximal cliques, on {n choose 2} points.
references: R. H. Jeurissen and Th. Bezembinder, Enumerating oriented triangle graphs, Ars Comb. 42(1996), 151-160.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..30
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d divides n} { d^d * ( (n-1)! )^d / ( n^d * d!) }, valid for n>4.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, d^d * ( (n-1)! )^d / ( n^d * d!) ); \\ for n>4, _Michel Marcus_, Mar 29 2014
author: R. H. Jeurissen (jeuris(AT)sci.kun.nl)
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 29 2014
